name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: League of Legends Katarina Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embrace Katarina's deadly precision with sleek visuals and quick shortcuts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unleash the deadly grace of Katarina with our League of Legends-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A sleek and intense interface inspired by Katarina’s lethal agility and striking style.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a display that reflects the sharp focus and swift nature of Katarina’s world.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Katarina-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Elevate your browsing experience with features as precise and impactful as Katarina’s blades.
